snippet.title: Whisker Squadron: Survivor Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Whisker Squadron: Survivor launches on February 21st on Steam and PS5.
Buy it on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2140100/Whisker_Squadron_Survivor/
Buy it on PS5: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10013096/

A smooth roguelite shooter from the creators of RACE THE SUN, featuring a voiced cast of feline pilots in a dramatic showdown against corporate-powered robots called The Swarm. Features a 3-act campaign with branching paths, epic bosses, and a wide arsenal of pilots, ships, and weapons.
